content: it's a good scan app documents very usefull and important

Going backwards. Default crop needs work to catch most of the useful stuff 
with 1st shot. One doesn't see what's caught unless click crop.
replyContent:
Hi Nick,

Thanks for your valuable feedback. There are some tips that can make the app works as you expect:
1. Set default filter to white in settings.
2. The auto crop cannot cover 100% accuracy, but you can archive almost 100% by capturing document on darker background (ex white, bright paper on brown, gray wood or darker background).

Thanks,
